intervalBefore.desc: end of T1 before beginning of T2; start & end both 'before start'

intervalMeets.desc: beginning of T1 is before T2’s start; end of T1 coincides with T2’s start

intervalIn.desc: T1's start >= T2's start and T1's end <= T2's end
intervalIn.warn: info loss due to ambiguity removal

intervalOverlaps.desc: start of T1 before T2’s start; end of T1 lies inside T2

intervalDuring.desc: both start and end of T1 lie inside T2

intervalStarts.desc: start of T1 = start of T2; end of T1 lies inside T2

intervalFinishes.desc: start of T1 lies inside T2; end of T1 = end of T2

intervalEquals.desc: both start and end of T1 coincide with T2

intervalAfter.desc: start of T1 after end of T2 ⇒ start & end both 'after end'

intervalMetBy.desc: start of T1 = end of T2; end of T1 after end of T2

intervalOverlappedBy.desc: start of T1 lies inside T2; end of T1 after T2’s end

intervalContains.desc: start of T1 before T2’s start; end of T1 after T2’s end

intervalStartedBy.desc: start of T1 = start of T2; end of T1 after T2’s end

intervalFinishedBy.desc: start of T1 before T2’s start; end of T1 = end of T2
